duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee supplier approval process and QMS evaluation.
Conduct periodic Supplier QMS and process audits.
Develop quality plan for New Product Introduction in collaboration with Engineering.
Drive supplier improvement and monitor incoming failure rates.
Manage supplier corrective actions and control AVL on a quarterly basis.
Ensure compliance with Conflict Minerals and facilitate supplier MRB utilizing TRB/Change request.
Manage and support supplier obsolescence in collaboration with cross-functional teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related field (5+ years of equivalent experience required)
